OnlyofficeEditorClient.PreviewNotAvailable: OnlyOffice document preview is not available now.
OnlyofficeEditorClient.EditorLinkNotFoundErrorMessage: Cannot get the editor's link - permission denied.
OnlyofficeEditorClient.StorageErrorMessage: Cannot get the editor's link because of storage errors.
OnlyofficeEditorClient.InternalEditorErrorMessage: Cannot get the editor's link because of an internal editor error.
OnlyofficeEditorClient.CannotLoadViewerScript: Cannot load DocsAPI script. Please contact the administrator.
OnlyofficeEditorClient.ErrorConfigNotDefined: The editor's configuration is not defined
OnlyofficeEditorClient.AnotherEditorIsOpen: Cannot create the editor. The document is being edited in another editor (provider)
OnlyofficeEditorClient.ErrorFileDeletedECMS: The file has been deleted. You can try to restore it from the Trash
OnlyofficeEditorClient.ErrorFileDeletedEditor: The file has been deleted. You can save it by clicking on File -> Save
OnlyofficeEditorClient.ErrorNameDriveNull: Could not determinate the drive of this file.
